projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: SingularityDAO Defi
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: SingularityDAO Defi

Description: SingularityDAO is building an AI backed DeFi hub for portfolio management to maximize yield on various digital assets. The solution is completely on EVM blockchains.

Skill sets: NodeJS, Python, AWS, ReactJS, NextJS, Solidity (is a plus but not mandatory)

Traits expectation: Our DApp is built using NextJS with a microservice based backend built using NodeJS and Python. Core logic of the product is built on chain using solidity based smart contracts. We need engineers to help build the product as well as build a framework to experiment and test different scenarios on the DApp.

Expected learning: Students have a unique opportunity to learn how trading strategies are built on blockchains using digital assets. They will be working closely with EVM based blockchains and learn how to build a world class financial application on the cloud.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Blockchain, Data structures, Algorithms, Cloud computing, Databases
